name: Required Containment Demo
description:
The new treatments were supposed to heal, but instead they decayed anyone infected, slowly turning them into empty zombie-like husks of their former selves. These experimental treatments gone wrong caused the hospital to be sealed indefinitely. Final communications from within suggest that some survivors were able to create a reversal agent before they were overwhelmed, but all efforts to retrieve the cure has failed. Enter the facility and find out more information.

Demo: this is meant to be the opening section of the larger game. Approximate time to complete the demo is 15mins. This is my first big project, so all feedback welcome!

Behind the scenes of development as well as updates on: youtube.com/@emptyventures
